text: Zamalek Sporting Club is a sport club in Egypt. It is located in Cairo. ==Honours & Achievements== 'Total number of cups: 86 ===Worldwide / Intercontinental=== *Afro-Asian Cup ** Winners (2) : 1987, 1997 (Record) ** Runners up (1) : 1994 ===African=== *CAF Champions League ** Winners (5) : 1984, 1986, 1993, 1996, 2002 ** Runners up (1) : 1994 *African Cup Winners' Cup ** Winners (1) : 2000 *CAF Super Cup ** Winners (3) : 1994, 1997, 2003 ** Runners up (1) : 2001 ===UAFA competitions=== * Arab Champions Cup ** Winners (1) : 2003 ===League=== *Egyptian Premier League ** Winners (12) : 1959–60, 1963–64, 1964–65, 1977–78, 1983–84, 1987–88, 1991–92, 1992–93, 2000–01, 2002–03, 2003–04, 2014–15 ** Runners up (31) : 1950-51, 1952–53, 1953–54, 1955–56, 1956–57, 1957–58, 1958–59, 1960–61, 1961–62, 1962–63, 1965–66, 1972–73, 1976–77, 1978–79, 1979–80, 1980–81, 1981–82, 1982–83, 1984–85, 1985-1986, 1986–87, 1988–89, 1994–95, 1995–96, 1996–97, 1997–98, 1998–99, 2005–06, 2006–07, 2009–10, 2010–11 *Cairo League ** Winners (15) : 1922–23, 1923–24, 1928–29, 1929–30, 1931–32, 1939–40, 1940–41, 1943–44, 1944–45, 1945–46, 1946–47, 1948–49, 1950–51, 1951–52, 1952–53 ** Runners up (6) : 1936–37, 1937–38, 1941–42, 1942–43, 1945–46, 1957–58 ===Cup=== *Egypt Cup (21 solo titles, two titles in conjunction with Ahly SC in 1943 and 1958) ** Winners (23) : 1922, 1932, 1935, 1938, 1941, 1943, 1944, 1952, 1955, 1957, 1958, 1959, 1960, 1962, 1975, 1977, 1979, 1988, 1999, 2002, 2008, 2013, 2014 ** Runners up (14) : 1928, 1931, 1933, 1934, 1942, 1948, 1949, 1953, 1963, 1978, 1992, 2006, 2007, 2011 *Egyptian Super Cup ** Winners (2) : 2001, 2002 ** Runners up (4) : 2003, 2004, 2008, 2014 * Sultan Hussein Cup ** Winners (2) : 1920–21, 1921–22 ** Runners up (3) : 1923-24, 1929–30, 1936–37 *King Fouad Cup ** Winners (3) *Saudi-Egyptian Super Cup (League Winners) ** Winners (1) : 2003 *Jordan International Cup (Egyptian-Jordanian Cup) ** Winners (2) : 1986, 1987 *Independence Cup (Friendship Cup) ** Winners (2) ===Domestic=== *Alexandria Summer League ** Winners (3) : 1982, 1984, 2004 *Giza League : ** Winners (1) *October League Cup ** Winners (1) 1973-74 (Record) *Egypt's Love Cup ** Winners (1) : 1986 *Union Cup "Egypt" (association football) ** Winners (1) : 1995 *Egypt Confederation Cup Refresher ** Winners (4) *Algerian- Egyptian Friendly Cup ** Winners (1) : 2014 Trophies and years are approved
